languages.text: "Быть может и так... Но это не значит, что за ошибки должно расплачиваться жизнью".

traits.locale_text: "Быть может и так... Но это не значит, что за ошибки должно расплачиваться жизнью".
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "They might have... But that does not mean they should pay for their mistakes with their lives."
languages.original_text: "Быть может и так... Но это не значит, что за ошибки должно расплачиваться жизнью".

traits.locale_text: "They might have... But that does not mean they should pay for their mistakes with their lives."

traits.locale_text: "They might have... But that does not mean they should pay for their mistakes with their lives."

traits.locale_text: "They might have... But that does not mean they should pay for their mistakes with their lives."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “或许确实如此……但这并不意味着他们应当为这个错误付出生命的代价。”
languages.original_text: "They might have... But that does not mean they should pay for their mistakes with their lives."

traits.locale_text: “或许确实如此……但这并不意味着他们应当为这个错误付出生命的代价。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Vielleicht ... Doch das heißt nicht, dass sie mit dem Leben für ihre Fehler bezahlen sollten."
languages.original_text: "They might have... But that does not mean they should pay for their mistakes with their lives."

traits.locale_text: "Vielleicht ... Doch das heißt nicht, dass sie mit dem Leben für ihre Fehler bezahlen sollten."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Bien podrían serlo... pero eso no significa que deban pagar por sus errores con la vida».
languages.original_text: "They might have... But that does not mean they should pay for their mistakes with their lives."

traits.locale_text: «Bien podrían serlo... pero eso no significa que deban pagar por sus errores con la vida».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « C'est possible... mais ce n'est pas une raison pour qu'ils paient leurs erreurs de leurs vies. »
languages.original_text: "They might have... But that does not mean they should pay for their mistakes with their lives."

traits.locale_text: « C'est possible... mais ce n'est pas une raison pour qu'ils paient leurs erreurs de leurs vies. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「そうかもしれない。しかし、だからといって、彼らがその過ちの代償を命で支払うべきだということにはならない」
languages.original_text: "They might have... But that does not mean they should pay for their mistakes with their lives."

traits.locale_text: 「そうかもしれない。しかし、だからといって、彼らがその過ちの代償を命で支払うべきだということにはならない」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Olabilir... Ancak bu demek değildir ki hatalarının bedelini canlarıyla ödemeliler."
languages.original_text: "They might have... But that does not mean they should pay for their mistakes with their lives."

traits.locale_text: "Olabilir... Ancak bu demek değildir ki hatalarının bedelini canlarıyla ödemeliler."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
